title: Stoker
data:

*For a list of all liches, see [list of liches](/List_of_liches "List of liches").*

|   |                                                                                                                                               |

|   | A mortal who made an unholy pact in life, now chained to tend the fires of hell in undeath as payment. It seems to want to keep its distance. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Stokers** are support casters found in Gehenna. They can force you away with [Wind Blast](/Wind_Blast "Wind Blast") and summon hostile [creeping infernos](/Creeping_inferno "Creeping inferno") while they travel through lava effortlessly.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                              |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Wind Blast](/Wind_Blast "Wind Blast")       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Stoke Flames](/Stoke_Flames "Stoke Flames") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Killing them will despawn their summoned creeping infernos.
- The [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm") created when a creeping inferno dies actually does rather minimal damage compared to an actual Fire Storm (from, say, [Cerebov](/Cerebov "Cerebov")). Decently armored characters with rF++ are not in immediate danger of taking serious damage from them.

## History

Stokers were added in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").

Stoker

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all liches, see list of liches.

stoker L 
HP 52-107
HD 13
XP 698
Speed 10
AC 5
EV 12
Will 120
Attack1 15 (touch: fire)


Resistances rF+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Amphibious lava
Intelligence Human
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type lich, stoker
Flags No skeleton
Maintain range
A mortal who made an unholy pact in life, now chained to tend the fires of hell in undeath as payment. It seems to want to keep its distance.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Stokers are support casters found in Gehenna. They can force you away with Wind Blast and summon hostile creeping infernos while they travel through lava effortlessly.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Wind Blast Wizard flag
Slot2 Stoke Flames Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Killing them will despawn their summoned creeping infernos.
  • The Fire Storm created when a creeping inferno dies actually does rather minimal damage compared to an actual Fire Storm (from, say, Cerebov). Decently armored characters with rF++ are not in immediate danger of taking serious damage from them.

History

Stokers were added in 0.28.
